title: What's Something You Always Wanted To Tell Your Teacher Growing Up?
description:
If you had the chance to tell your teacher ANYTHING when you were in school, what would it have been? The question is coming up after Cassie saw a teacher doing this with her students. She asked her students what they wanted her/their parents to know.
There were some cute and insightful responses. Cassie's started doing this (on the toddler level) with her daughter, and it helps her feel heard.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
